useCase.name: Register New Identity

successEndConditions.condition: New identity successfully registered in DAMS system.

useCase.trigger: User requests registration of a new identity.

mainSequence.step: Registration Interface requests existing identities from Central Repository Database.
Central Repository Database returns a list of existing identities to Registration Interface.
Registration Interface displays the list of identities to Repository Manager.
Repository Manager provides details for a new identity.
Registration Interface validates and prepares the new identity record.
Identity Management Module checks for duplicate records in Central Repository Database.
DAMS Core System registers the new identity if it is unique.
DAMS Core System stores the new identity record in Central Repository Database.
DAMS Core System confirms the registration and provides an ID for the new record to Identity Management Module.
Identity Management Module confirms the new identity registration to Registration Interface.
Registration Interface displays a success message and the new identity ID to Repository Manager.
